#summary The testing plan for new embedded PC.

= Introduction =

 In order to make sure the new embedded PC can replace the old system, it has to pass the following tasks:


= Task List =
|| == Check Item == || == Pass == || 
|| Download and run XP version LocalBrain executable file   ||  ||
|| Use new LocalBrain program to control the motors/servo ||  ||
|| Able to connect to the Host ||  ||
|| Able to receive commands from Host ||   ||
|| Able to be drove by the the remote control program || ||
